Tonight the [Rustical Quality String Band](https://acousticbrew.org/event/rustical-quality-string-band/) will perform in the [Acoustic Brew](https://acousticbrew.org) concert series at the Boal Barn Great Room in Boalsburg.

If you love old timey music, and I do, then come on down to the Barn.
I guarantee that RQSB will burn the barn down, musically speaking that is.
